definitions.definition: A person who formally opposes the current political structure , the political group in power , the policies of the political group in power, or current laws .
One who disagrees or dissents; one who separates from the established religion .

subdefinitions.definition: Sometimes Dissident : in the kingdom of Poland , the name for Christians not part of the Roman Catholic Church .

main_definition: A person who formally opposes the current political structure , the political group in power , the policies of the political group in power, or current laws .
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) One who disagrees or dissents; one who separates from the established religion .
